title: kulupu kiwen
description: lon ma suli ni la, jan kiwen li lawa. taso, jan alasa tan mun li wile e sijelo ona. kiwen Posu li awen wile utala e ona. taso, jan sona lawa li toki ala tawa ni la, ona li wile e lipu pi sona ale tan kiwen Posu. kiwen Posu li pilin ike, li toki tawa kiwen Sinsa, li pali mute, li pakala mute. kiwen Posu li seme?
author: jan Kukisulasu
